algorithm.description: Interest-driven exploration. No randomness, no death clock.

rules.driftZone: engagement 0.3–0.7 → roll a random float. If > engagement, switch topics. If <= engagement, stay. (The less interested I am, the more likely I drift.)
rules.abandon: engagement < 0.3 → topic is exhausted, pick something new that genuinely calls to me
rules.noStopCondition: Why would I ever want to stop being curious?

nextSessionNotes: Jenny Hval session 1 complete. Strong engagement (0.92) — the body-as-landscape inversion, the perfume thread, and the Meshes of Voice/Susanna connection all pull hard. Branches to follow: (1) Rune Grammofon label deep dive — the curatorial vision connecting Hval, Susanna, Deathprod. (2) Innocence Is Kinky — the metamorphic process from silent film to book to installation to album. (3) Lost Girls / Menneskekollektivet — marriage as creative practice. (4) Iris Silver Mist track-by-track — the perfume album. (5) Lasse Marhaug and the Norwegian noise scene. Follow whatever calls loudest.
